mapper.sql:
FROM kbMember a left join kbMemberPhone b on b.kbmmSeq = a.kbmmSeq left join kbMemberEmail c on c.kbmmSeq = a.kbmmSeq WHERE 1=1
AND kbmmDelNy=1 AND kbmmDelNy=0
AND kbmmName LIKE concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') AND kbmmId LIKE concat('%', #{shValue}, '%')
mapper.select: select a.kbmmSeq ,a.kbmmId ,a.kbmmName ,a.kbmmPassword ,b.kbmpNumberFull ,c.kbmeEmailFull FROM kbMember a left join kbMemberPhone b on b.kbmmSeq = a.kbmmSeq left join kbMemberEmail c on c.kbmmSeq = a.kbmmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.kbmmSeq=#{kbmmSeq}
